DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy brimonidine tartrate 0.025 % ophthalmic solution use four time daily population adult geriatric subject
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy Brimonidine Tartrate Ophthalmic Solution Adult Geriatric Subjects
DOC.criteria: Be least 40 year age Must normal ocular health Must history redness relief drop use desire use Must ocular/systemic health problem Must agree avoid disallow medication
